CustomField.formula: (CASE(List_Saved_to_Client_Folder__c, "0",0, "1",1, "2",2, "3",3, 0)+ CASE(List_Criteria_Created__c , "0",0, "1",1, "2",2, "3",3, 0)+ CASE( Case_Issue_Number_Is_Tied__c , "0",0, "1",1, "2",2, "3",3, 0)+ CASE( Status_Updated_Appropriately__c , "0",0, "1",1, "2",2, "3",3, 0)+ CASE( List_Clarity__c , "0",0, "1",1, "2",2, "3",3, 0)+ CASE( No_Apparent_Red_Flags__c , "0",0, "1",1, "2",2, "3",3, 0))/18
CustomField.label: List Management Score
